column1: Yup. It’s called coronavirus and they’re comparing it to sars. Fun times

By all accounts, these guys get along on a personal level. They should convert tonight into a joint coronavirus discussion to offer a moment of party unity & a display of what presidential leadership could be. The point: the alternative to Trump, whoever it is, is the only choice https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1239335587045412864 …
